long_description: for over 45 years the lohr group has continually adapted to the specific needs of its customers and to automotive logistic evolutions. strong innovation strategy and permanent dialog with clients have constantly improved carrying capacity, safety, user friendliness and flexibility all represented in their state of the art in our current ranges like eurolohr, chr, multilohr and maxilohr to mention only the best known. in addition the company lohr service has been set up in 1999 as a specific tool totally dedicated to customer assistance for the various group activities. our job is to help all users of our products by technical support, spare parts supply, network workshop availability and in general terms propose practical solutions in order to optimise global life cost of our vehicles. depuis plus de 45 ans, le groupe lohr s'adapte continuellement aux besoins spécifiques de ses clients et aux évolutions de la logistique automobile. une forte stratégie d'innovation et un dialogue permanent avec les clients ont permis d'améliorer constamment la capacité de charge, la sécurité, la convivialité et la flexibilité, le tout représenté dans l'état de l'art de nos gammes actuelles comme eurolohr, chr, multilohr et maxilohr pour ne citer que les plus connues. en outre, la société lohr service a été créée en 1999 comme un outil spécifique totalement dédié à l'assistance à la clientèle pour les différentes activités de groupe. notre mission est d'aider tous les utilisateurs de nos produits par un support technique, la fourniture de pièces détachées, la disponibilité des ateliers du réseau et d'une manière générale de proposer des solutions pratiques afin d'optimiser le coût global de vie de nos véhicules.

generated_description: lohr group is a company that has been adapting to the specific needs of its customers and the evolution of automotive logistics for over 45 years. with a strong focus on innovation and constant communication with clients, the company has continuously improved its carrying capacity, safety, user-friendliness, and flexibility. their current product ranges, including eurolohr, chr, multilohr and maxilohar, are known for their state-of-the-art technology. in 1999, lohr service was established as a dedicated customer assistance tool for the group's activities. their mission is to provide technical support, spare parts supply, network workshop availability, and practical solutions to optimize the global life cost of their vehicles.
